name: amasty/module-faq-product-questions
description: FAQ and Products by Amasty team

suggest.amasty/module-gdpr-faq-sample-data: Please install Gdpr Faq sample data module to add sample data.
suggest.amasty/module-faq-graphql: We recommend to install Faq GraphQL module if you use Magento 2.3.3+.
suggest.amasty/module-faq-product-questions-mftf: Install module-faq-product-questions-mftf-3 module to be able to run FAQ MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.2+ version.
